pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quantify Compositional Variability Across Relative Abundance Vectors // Implements the statistic FAVA, an Fst-based Assessment of Variability across vectors of relative Abundances, as well as a suite of helper functions which enable the visualization and statistical analysis of relative abundance data. The 'FAVA' R package accompanies the paper, Quantifying compositional variability in microbial communities with FAVA by Morrison, Xue, and Rosenberg (2025) doi:10.1073/pnas.2413211122.
